question: Anesthesia of choice for cesarean section in severe preeclampsia:-
exp: Spinal Anesthesia: m/c anesthesia for cesarean section Complication: Hypotension and Bradycardia. Epidural anesthesia: Anesthesia of choice for cesarean section in severe preeclampsia, cardiac disease. Hemodynamic imbalance is less as compared to spinal anesthesia, so it is used.
